theorem coe_pred (j : Fin (n + 1)) (h : j ≠ 0) : (j.pred h : Nat) = j - 1 := rfl
@[simp] theorem succ_pred : ∀ (i : Fin (n + 1)) (h : i ≠ 0), (i.pred h).succ = i
  | ⟨0, _⟩, hi => by simp only [mk_zero, ne_eq, not_true] at hi
  | ⟨_ + 1, _⟩, _ => rfl
@[simp]
theorem pred_succ (i : Fin n) {h : i.succ ≠ 0}
